title: I can charge with my Pixel 3 with an old Sony charger but can't charge with a Google's charger
content:
Few days ago my Google charger doesn't work on my phone so I used an old Sony charger instead and it works. Then I got a new Google charger today, but it doesn't work either. 
So what is the problem with my Pixel 3? Why does Google charger doesn't work but an old Sony charger works? Can you help me quickly? Thanks
